info.name: OOTS Readable
info.description: Makes the webcomic "Order of the Stick" easier to read by making the comic centered on page, removing all clutter and making the background a better color. Get this Greasemonkey userscript to be able to use your left/right arrow keys to navigate between comics.
info.additionalInfo: Made mostly for myself and my partner, feel free to use if you like it but do not expect miracles here ;)
